name: Astronaut Launch Combo Game - Drift Mode In Space
name_original: Astronaut Launch Combo Game - Drift Mode In Space
description:
Astronaut Launch
” Amazing graphics”
”Incredible Sound effects.”
“Creative and Fun Game.”
” Exciting Levels.”
___________________________________

Exploring the inexplicable space out of the comfort and safety of our home planet is certainly a daring feat. Since you are already out there, though, why not go the extra mile and collect the rare items—like stars—to bring home? Players will find the genuine vision of the space to be a remarkable experience.

Astronaut Launch is an action game that offers players a chance to experience the future of space exploration using innovative science and engineering. With a crazy character, simple but risky gameplay, and a mishmash of cartoon and photo-realistic designs, Astronaut Launch will certainly capture your heart and make you desirous to play the game again and again.

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Power-ups to boost and grab your galactic score
Out-of-this-world achievements to unlock and boast of
Simple but cute graphics.
One-touch control that both the young and young-at-heart will enjoy
